Home → Feedback for the Literacy, Books and Reading Team for Schools

Feedback for the Literacy, Books and Reading Team for Schools

This page features selected comments from teachers whose schools have benefitted from our expertise. If you wish to give feedback on any aspect of our service, please contact us.

"Many thanks for the boxes of books received recently. They are WONDERFUL. I will be promoting them at Staff Briefing this week."
- Joan Gibson, The Bridge School.

"Just wanted to say thank you very much for the lovely box of books you sent me last week for the Fact-finder Library. It was like opening a birthday present!"
- Sue Woolgar, Capel St Mary Church of England VC Primary School.

"LBaRT is a fantastic service for schools. The library loans my school receives are current, promptly delivered and with an excellent selection. My requests are always met with a variety of titles eagerly waiting to be read by our pupils."
- Jo Stott, Westley Middle School

"The excitement and enthusiasm conveyed to parents at your Book Cafés each Christmas make a magical time of year even more so! We are hoping that parents will re-connect with the importance of reading with their children as they love what you do."
- Sarah Grover, Hardwick Primary School

"Many thanks for coming to sort through our books, it has definitely improved our library area and has exposed children to new books."
- Otley Primary School

"I just wanted to say a huge thank you to you for arranging for Sheila to come along and help last week. I honestly don’t know what I would have done without her! We managed to shelve all of the non-fiction and we both felt that we achieved a great deal.
- Jayne Gould, Broke Hall Primary School

Privacy & cookies

By using our site you agree to our use of cookies. Find out what cookies we use, how they affect you and how you can control them: our cookie policy.
